dcterms:creator: M. Cordts
M. Omran
S. Ramos
T. Rehfeld
M. Enzweiler
R. Benenson
U. Franke
S. Roth
B. Schiele
dcterms:description: A large dataset of urban driving scenes, captured in several cities of central Europe under normal conditions and containing high-quality pixel-level semantic annotations for a set of 19 common classes in driving scenes.
dcterms:title: Cityscapes

dcterms:creator: C. Sakaridis
D. Dai
L. Van Gool
dcterms:description: A dataset comprising nighttime images of driving scenes, which are split into training, validation, and test images, featuring high-quality semantic annotations for the same set of classes as Cityscapes.
dcterms:title: Dark Zurich

dcterms:creator: C. Sakaridis
D. Dai
L. Van Gool
dcterms:description: The Adverse Conditions Dataset with Correspondences for semantic driving scene understanding, featuring images under various adverse conditions.
dcterms:title: ACDC

dcterms:creator: F. Yu
H. Chen
X. Wang
W. Xian
Y. Chen
F. Liu
V. Madhavan
T. Darrell
dcterms:description: A diverse driving dataset for heterogeneous multitask learning, specifically focusing on nighttime images with accurate segmentation labels.
dcterms:title: BDD100K-night
